article.text: Russia's Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov has called on the UN and Arab League envoy on Syria Kofi Annan to speed up ceasefire talks with the opposition, a source in the Russian Foreign Ministry told the media after Mr. Lavrov and Mr. Annan had a conversation on the phone. Russia's chief diplomat said that the Syrian opposition and countries loyal to it 'should take urgent measures to stop violence'. Mr. Lavrov told Annan that he had had talks with the Syrian Foreign Minister Walid al Muallem in Moscow on Tuesday, adding that Damascus confirmed its readiness to implement a UNSC-backed peace plan and cooperate with Annan`s mission. Sergei Lavrov believes that the UN should urgently launch its peacekeeping mission in Syria. Mr. Annan praised Russia`s assistance to his mission in the region.
